CheckTitle: Ensure That There Are No Dormant Service Accounts
Description: Ensure That There Are No Dormant Service Accounts. A SA is considered dormant if it has been inactive for more than 180 days.
Risk: A malicious actor could make use of privilege escalation or impersonation to access an unused Service Account that is over-priviledged.

Recommendation.Text: It is recommended to disable or remove unused Service Accounts.
